My company logo

My company is also called Consolia, same as my webcomic.

Why I chose this particular design is a long story. It's fluffy and colorful and amazing, that makes it the best logo ever no matter how you look at it.

Want to contact me?

I'd love to hear from you. Whether it's weird questions, silly remarks, funny insults, or commissions of any of the aforementioned adjectives; all equally loved.

Reach me at tim@consolia-comic.com or use the twitters @timquax.
